description: Conversion of roof space to habitable use to include a rear dormer, 2 front roof lights and removal of chimney (Application for a Certificate of Lawful Development for a Proposed Development)
decision_conditions: Given the proposed dormer extension would provide an additional bedroom (equating to 7 bedrooms in total) the proposed HMO property would not constitute a small HMO (Class C4) as as defined by the The Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 (as amended). The proposed development would facilitate a large HMO (Sui Generis) that does not benefit from permitted development rights as set out under the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended). As such, the development would not be lawful and would require planning permission.
